entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN CLEARING
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE EVENING

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
